short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces one or more words on websites just for fun.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Did you ever wish to replace a name or a term an a website? Here is your tool! Just type in the word to replace and the one you wish to read instead and have some fun! What about to read >>Dumb<< instead of >>Trump<< ;-)
